attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hain must go because gordon brown has said he that he is guilty of incompetence, what double standards, if people are late with their tax returns or do not declare the full amount they face a fine or worse depending on the circumstances,hain  did not declare on time therefor he should go and go now as in my mind he is guilty of double standards at the very least

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
